step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in future repetitions.
You're doing well raising your hands towards your forehead. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you move them up.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
You held the position well. Keep your head upright and avoid leaning forward.
Nicely done returning to the starting position. Remember to keep your wrists aligned as you bring your hands down.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your wrists straight and elbows close when moving your hands up. Continue to spread your elbows wide behind your head for a good stretch.
